import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react'; // Import useRef and useState import './Footer.css'; import { Button } from './Button'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; function Footer() { const form = useRef(); // Create a ref for the form const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); // Create state to hold the message const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm('service_bwyxkaa', 'template_ywp2pd4', form.current, 'ZsMgOetuKn62a8c8a') .then( () => { setMessage('Subscription successful! Thank you.'); }, (error) => { setMessage(`Subscription failed: ${error.text}`); }, ); }; return (

); } export default Footer;
